  • Constructor Details

    • Library

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static Library create​(IDatabase db, MatrixData data, File folder)
      Creates a new library by writing the given matrix data into the given folder. It will try to derive the name and version of the library from the name of the given folder which should follow the pattern `_`. Note that this method will modify the data of the matrices A and B if these are not normalized 1 | -1. Thus, you should not reuse the matrices after calling this method are provide a copy of the data.

    • getInfo

      public LibraryInfo getInfo()

    • getProductIndex

      public Proto.ProductIndex getProductIndex()
      Get the product index of this library.

    • syncProducts

      public Optional<TechIndex> syncProducts​(IDatabase db)
      Returns the products of the library in matrix order. If this library has no product index or if this index is not in sync with the database, an empty option is returned.

    • getElemFlowIndex

      public Proto.ElemFlowIndex getElemFlowIndex()
      Get the elementary flow index of this library.

    • syncElementaryFlows

      public Optional<FlowIndex> syncElementaryFlows​(IDatabase db)
      Returns the elementary flows of the library in matrix order. If this information is not present or something went wrong while synchronizing the flow index with the database, an empty option is returned.

    • getImpactIndex

      public Proto.ImpactIndex getImpactIndex()
      Get the impact category index of this library. Note that an empty index instead of `null` is returned if this information is not present in this library.

    • syncImpacts

      public Optional<ImpactIndex> syncImpacts​(IDatabase db)
      Returns the impact categories of the library in matrix order. If this information is not present or something went wrong while synchronizing the impact index with the database, an empty option is returned.

    • hasMatrix

      public boolean hasMatrix​(LibraryMatrix m)

    • getMatrix

      public Optional<MatrixReader> getMatrix​(LibraryMatrix m)

    • getColumn

      public Optional<double[]> getColumn​(LibraryMatrix m, int column)

    • getDiagonal

      public Optional<double[]> getDiagonal​(LibraryMatrix m)
      Get the diagonal of the given library matrix.

    • getExchanges

      public List<Exchange> getExchanges​(ProcessProduct product, IDatabase db)
      Creates a list of exchanges from the library matrices that describe the inputs and outputs of the given library product. The meta-data of the exchanges are synchronized with the given databases. Thus, this library needs to be mounted to the given database.

    • getImpactFactors

      public List<ImpactFactor> getImpactFactors​(ImpactDescriptor impact, IDatabase db)
